name: IntaSend Payment
author: Felix Cheruiyot

sections.description: IntaSend enables businesses to get paid with mobile and card payments (Visa and Mastercard). We automatically help customers to complete payments at checkout. Customer securely pay for your goods and services and you are able to track from the IntaSend dashboard and monitor every transaction.
sections.faq:
How do I start using IntaSend for Payment Collection?

  1. Add the plugin “IntaSend Payment for WooCommerce” to your site.
  2. Create account at IntaSend Payment Gateway to get generate API keys.
  3. Add the API keys to your plugin under wp-admin.
  4. Publish and start accepting Card and Mobile payments.

How do it test before live publishing?

Generate test keys from the sandbox and configure the plugin to be on test mode. Use the following test cards for your test.

How much does it cost to use IntaSend?

Please check our pricing here

How do I get support?

Feel free to contact us through https://support.intasend.com for both transaction queries and developers support respectively.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial setup
  • Enabled sandbox and live support
  • Card and mobile payments
  • Default currency setup
